intro: Combretum tetrandrum subsp. australe, commonly known as the Australian flame tree, is a deciduous shrub or small tree native to eastern Australia. It belongs to the family Lythraceae and is characterized by its showy, bright red or orange flowers that appear in clusters during the spring and summer.
